description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Experience air to air combat against AI controlled enemies, only to get jumped by human players at any moment. Manage your power supply mid battle... shields? lasers? engines? Upgrade your ship and show off your moves to friends. Supports up to 8 players at once. Music by Bensound.com
